alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; Central Mountains; San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 11:26PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Emery and south central Carbon Counties through 1215 AM MDT... At 1126 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Huntington, or 26 miles southwest of Price, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Castle Dale, Orangeville, Cleveland and Elmo. This includes Utah Route 10 between mile markers 32 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; Central Mountains; San Rafael Swell
